T01D1173:250b-1: si ha n'a da lo ke shra ra bha tt'a ra ka sya stu ti /
T01D1173:250b-3: rje btsun 'jig rten dbang phyug seng ge sgra la bstod pa /
T01D1173:250b-4: 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01D1173:250b-5: srid pa'i gnas ni grangs bral bgrang 'dod 'dir khyod la //
T01D1173:250b-6: 'ong [?] ldan snyan ngag mkhan po ches cher dga' ba'i gtam //
T01D1173:250b-7: yon tan tshogs brjod de ltar bdag ni blo ngan yang //
T01D1173:250b-8: 'gro ba gnyis su mngon bstod sar pa'i tshig dag 'god //
T01D1173:250b-9: rgya chen srid pa'i pha rol byang chub ston mdzad pa //
T01D1173:250b-10: dus ring thang gcig bzhin du byas te brtse bas sku bzung nas //
T01D1173:250b-11: sems can gnas pa ma lus kun mkhyen de nyid la 'god mdzad //
T01D1173:250b-12: 'gro ba'i mgon po brtse ldan seng ge'i sgra de
T01D1173:250b-13: rgyal gyur cig / gang tshe ri bong mtshan ma
T01D1173:250b-15: gang gang chos mkhas sgrub byed bi shva karma bzhin //
T01D1173:250b-16: ma lus dkar ba'i snying po nyams dga'i dngos mdzad pa //
T01D1173:250b-17: de yang seng ge'i sgra ste 'od zer 'phro zhing
T01D1173:250b-18: rgyal gyur cig / dbu la rin chen 'bar ba
T01D1173:250b-19: 'bad pas gnas par mdzad pas ci //
T01D1173:250b-20: legs byas rang bzhin sgron me 'di ni nyer 'dzin mdzad pa lags //
T01D1173:250b-21: de ltar gang zhig lag 'gro lta bu'i the tsom bdud ni 'joms //
T01D1173:250b-22: pha rol rgol las rnam rgyal seng ge'i sgra des khyed la srungs //
T01D1173:250b-23: 'gro ba gsum gyi sa la mkhas shing bdud kyi phyogs ni 'joms //
T01D1173:250b-24: lag 'gro'i bdag por gnas pa'i nad ni 'joms shing bzhugs //
T01D1173:250b-25: gang gi rtse gsum dmyal bar 'gro ba'i rtsa ba 'joms pa ste //
T01D1173:251a-0: mchog ldan re nu'i sras po seng ge sgra la phyag @251a * //
T01D1173:251a-2: phul byung dkar ba'i rab lta bu yi shel gyi bgrang phreng yang //
T01D1173:251a-3: dge ba mdzad pa'i phyag tu thogs pas gshin rje yang dag gnon //
T01D1173:251a-4: rab tu mdzes pa nor bu'i rol pa brtse dang tshul khrims ldan //
T01D1173:251a-5: dges pa'i spyan ldan seng ge'i sgra des khyed la
T01D1173:251a-6: srung gyur cig / snying la 'bab pa'i gang gi
T01D1173:251a-7: ral pa mdzes pa'i zer 'di ni //
T01D1173:251a-8: 'bar zhing g-yo ba sa 'dzin lag 'gro lhag ma la ni nyal //
T01D1173:251a-9: 'od gsal mkhar rol 'o ma'i rgya mtshor aindra n'i la bzhin //
T01D1173:251a-10: seng ge'i sgra des khyed la shis pa mtha' dag
T01D1173:251a-11: ston gyur cig /'gro ba rnam par phongs pa'i thabs
T01D1173:251a-12: su gyur pa'i rkyen gang yin //
T01D1173:251a-13: bdud bcu po rnams ral gri'i so yis zhi mdzad pa //
T01D1173:251a-14: srid pa gsum gyis zhabs la btud pa seng ge'i sgra de yis //
T01D1173:251a-15: de ni 'gro ba'i nad dang nyer 'tshe 'joms shing
T01D1173:251a-16: sel gyur cig / ri dags bdag po yang ni
T01D1173:251a-17: dpal ldan lha rigs skyabs 'os te //
T01D1173:251a-18: bde gshegs theg pa rig mngon pa yi nga rgyal kun las grol //
T01D1173:251a-19: bde gshegs phrin las rnam rgyas gang gi sku la 'dzin mdzad pa //
T01D1173:251a-20: seng ge'i sgra des khyed kyi mngon par 'dod don
T01D1173:251a-21: sgrub gyur cig / de ltar bdag gis khyod kyi
T01D1173:251a-22: yon tan tshogs ni yongs su brjod pa las //
T01D1173:251a-23: zhi ba'i rang bzhin dge ba'i 'bras bu bsags pa'i tshogs rnams kyis //
T01D1173:251a-24: ma lus 'gro ba 'di dag dga' ba'i bdag po'i lag tu ma lhung zhing //
T01D1173:251a-25: rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs la kun nas rab tu
T01D1173:251a-26: 'jug gyur cig / mgon po 'di yi gzugs kyi
T01D1173:251a-27: rang bzhin sku ni kun nas thob gyur te //
T01D1173:251a-28: ma lus 'gro ba ji snyed 'di ni rnam par
T01D1173:251a-29: 'dren pa nyid gyur cig / kun nas gtsang mar
T01D1173:251a-30: byas pa skye bo'i bzhin gyi me long 'di //
T01D1173:251a-31: dpal thob ldan pa snyan ngag mkhan gyi bdag po gnyis skyes srung bas byas /
T01D1173:251a-32: rje btsun 'jig rten dbang phyug seng ge'i sgra la bstod pa rdzogs so /
T01D1173:251a-34: // / dpal ldan bla ma dam pa rgyal ba spyan
T01D1173:251a-35: snga rin po che'i bka' bzhin zha lu lo ts'a
